wikipedia_page.main: Signalman Kenneth Smith GC (7 December 1920 – 10 January 1945) of the Royal Corps of Signals, was posthumously awarded the George Cross for the bravery he showed on the night of 10 January 1945 on the island of Ist in the Adriatic when attached to the Long Range Desert Group.

response: *Kenneth Smith (baseball), played Baseball at the 1956 Summer Olympics
*Kenneth Smith (sailor), competed in 1960 Star World Championships
*Kenneth Smith (swimmer), competed in 2006 FINA World Open Water Swimming Championships – Men's 10K
*Kenneth Smith (British Army soldier) (1920–1945), recipient of the George Cross
